div1.p: Cassidy asks Hench critique the attached article on the Camp Lazear dedication.

div1.head: Memorandum from Helen Cassidy to Philip Showalter Hench, April 21, 1953
div1.p:
This is the Camp Lazear story for
Mayovox, based on the material which
you sent me. I should appreciate your
criticism and suggestions.

I'd like to have a look at the pictures
you mentioned to select one or two to
go with the story. If you have one of
you placing the wreath at the
memorial that would be a good one for us.

We'd like to know also when it will be
okay for us to use the story.
